summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Administrative Services; transferring positions of employment, certain functions, and the files and records of the Board of Public Works and Executive Department's Division of Purchases to said department; establishing therein a Contracting Appeals Board and specifying its functions amending SMC 3.18.010, -.030.H, and -.070 to increase the authority of the Director of Administrative Services; amending SMC 3.14.020 through -.070, and SMC 3.14.804 -.836 and -.838; SMC 3.18.070 through -.120; SMC Ch. 3.44; and SMC 20.48.020 through -.040, and -.070; and adding two new subchapters and several new sections to SMC Ch. 3.18, all in connection therewith.
